scripts.postinstall: cd api && yarn install && cd ../models && yarn install && cd ../ui && yarn install
scripts.start: echo "▶️  Starting local environment..." && pm2 kill && yarn build:api && pm2 start config/local-ecosystem.config.js
scripts.debug: echo "🐞 ▶️  Starting local (debug) environment..." && pm2 kill && pm2 start config/debug-local-ecosystem.config.js
scripts.build:api: echo "☁️  Building api" && cd api && yarn build
scripts.build:models: echo "🗳  Building models" && cd models && yarn build
